title: Apply uploaded logo site-wide, update contact details everywhere, and add Google Maps embed + Get Directions link

requirements.text: Replace the current site logo with the user-uploaded image ("Prasad Enterprise.png") and display it consistently across all pages wherever the logo appears (e.g., the sticky header). Ensure the logo renders crisply on light/dark backgrounds and maintains aspect ratio without distortion.

quotes: use this as my business logo on all the pages.

acceptanceCriteria: Header logo image is updated to the provided uploaded logo and appears on every route (Home, Category, Inquiry, Lead Form, Success, Contact).
Logo maintains correct aspect ratio (no stretching) and looks sharp at common sizes (e.g., ~40â€“48px in header).
No references remain to the old placeholder/logo asset in the rendered UI.

requirements.text: Update site-wide contact details to match the user-provided information and show them on all pages (at minimum in both Header and Footer, and also on the Contact page). Use clickable tel: links for both phone numbers and a clickable mailto: link for the email address. Display the full store address exactly as provided.

acceptanceCriteria: Header and Footer both display: +91 7384327313, +91 9955678588, prasadenterprise.info@gmail.com, and the full store address.
Both phone numbers are clickable and use tel:+917384327313 and tel:+919955678588 respectively.
Email is clickable and uses mailto:prasadenterprise.info@gmail.com.
Contact page replaces the current placeholder phone numbers and placeholder emails with the user-provided phone numbers and email address, and shows the store address exactly as provided.

requirements.text: On the Contact page, add a "Visit Our Store" section that (A) embeds the provided Google Maps iframe code and (B) includes a "Get Directions" link/button that opens Google Maps app/web for directions to the store when clicked.

quotes: Add this code under "Get Direction", under visit our store, when someone clicks on this link, redirect them to google maps app/web to get firection to the store - <iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3562.1405242591272!2d88.4175046!3d26.771790199999995!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x39e441b08d865489%3A0x26f26a46b2653836!2sPrasad%20Enterprises!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sin!4v1771014308362!5m2!1sen!2sin" width="400" height="300" style="border:0;" allowfullscreen="" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade"></iframe>

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page includes an embedded Google Map using the exact iframe src provided by the user.
A "Get Directions" UI control is present and opens Google Maps in a new tab/window (or app when available) to get directions to the store.
The "Get Directions" UI control is clearly associated with the store location section and remains usable on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Frontend paths listed as immutable must not be edited (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, and frontend/src/components/ui).
Do not add email-sending or any external messaging integration; contact actions must remain tel:/mailto: only.
Backend must remain single-actor Motoko; no new backend requirements are introduced for these changes.
nonGoals: Adding social media links/accounts (Footer currently has placeholders; leave unchanged unless explicitly requested).
Implementing real-time location features, geolocation, or map APIs beyond the provided iframe embed and an outbound Google Maps directions link.

required: Square-cropped, background-cleaned version of the provided logo image (prasad-enterprise-logo-upload.dim_512x512.png)
